results.title: Elastic integrations overview - Azure Native Integrations
results.description: What is Elastic in Azure. Use Azure Nat... Elastic in Azure is a set of managed services that deliver search, log analytics, and security monitoring functions for Azure environments. Elastic in Azure is used to implement distributed search, log aggregation, application performance monitoring, and security event analysis for Azure-based workloads..

results.title: Deploy ElasticSearch on a development virtual machine in Azure - Azure Virtual Machines
results.description: Install the Elastic Stack (ELK) on an Azure VM Deploy and Explore Applies to: ✔️ Linux VMs ✔️ Flexible scale sets This article walks you through how to deploy Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana,... In this tutorial you learn how to: Create an Ubuntu VM in an Azure resource group Install Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana on the VM Send sample.
